definition: to arrange an interview/an appointment (with the foreign ambassador)
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: You were still at your optometrist appointment.
sentences.chinese: 你仍旧在你验光师约见的地方。

sentences.english: We have arranged a meeting for the company with the Vice Governor.
sentences.chinese: 我们还为这家公司约见了河南省副省长。

sentences.english: QinQiong came to changan, suddenly by a masked people appointment.
sentences.chinese: 秦琼来到长安，忽然被一蒙面人士约见。

sentences.english: I'd like to make a meeting with Mr.
sentences.chinese: 你看欲擒故纵我想约见史密斯师长。

sentences.english: ChengJun call appointment dao Yin, speak to the idea of together.
sentences.chinese: 成俊打电话约见道贤，说出想联手的想法。

sentences.english: Ypur ability to get an appointment with Dr. in a non-emergency.
sentences.chinese: 你有能力约见医生在非急诊时。

sentences.english: Please remind me of the appointment with the project management.
sentences.chinese: 请到时提醒我与项目经理的约见。

sentences.english: Do you often cancel plans to meet others at the last second?
sentences.chinese: 你经常在最后时刻取消和他人约见的计划？

sentences.english: To investigate Connors' cause of death, he saw line person of Connors secretly about.
sentences.chinese: 为了调查康纳的死因，他秘密约见了康纳的线人。

sentences.english: I appreciate your kindness in granting me an interview yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨日蒙先生约见，万分感激。

sentences.english: Ye Lang make an appointment with a representative of all the brands hope they will also him one.
sentences.chinese: 叶朗约见一众品牌商代表，希望众人会还他一个人情。

sentences.english: On a Friday after work, Mr. Munson met me at the Plaza Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 星期五下班后，老李和我在广场酒店约见。

sentences.english: Can I arrange an appointment for Monday?
sentences.chinese: 我可以安排星期一约见吗？

sentences.english: I could have rescheduled my appointment!
sentences.chinese: 那样我可以重订我们的约见时间。

sentences.english: Cheng again meet son, want to help persuade beauty back to the boots.
sentences.chinese: 成斌再次约见达子，想让达子帮忙劝说丽人回到博姿。
